.. _tag_Gripper_open_gripper_:

open_gripper Method
=======================

.. container:: step-block

    .. py:method:: XenseGripper.open_gripper(self)
        :module: xensegripper

        Opens the gripper (sets the gripper position to the fully open state).

        This method is implemented by calling :meth:`~XenseGripper.set_position`.
